title: The new OnePlus Nord CE 2 is a minor refresh with a new design, a MediaTek SoC, and 65W fast charging support
content:
After sharing some details about the OnePlus Nord CE 2 over the last few days, OnePlus has finally lifted the covers off the device. The latest mid-ranger from the company is a minor upgrade over the original OnePlus Nord CE, featuring a MediaTek SoC, a high refresh rate display, 65W fast charging support, and an

The post The new OnePlus Nord CE 2 is a minor refresh with a new design, a MediaTek SoC, and 65W fast charging support appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The new OnePlus Nord CE 2 is a minor refresh featuring a MediaTek Dimensity 900 SoC, a new design, and 65W wired fast charging support.
